name: How far can you make it?
name_original: How far can you make it?
description:
- This game is also available on Google Play -

- If the game gets somewhat a little popular, I will try and implement multiplayer! -

How far can you make it? That's the question!
Do you have what it takes to be at the top of the leaderboard?
I BET YOU DO!
Use all your skills, even the ones you didn't know you had, and avoid those pesky spikes and that evil Mr Slime!

Collect power ups and extra life to help you dodge your way to the top of the leaderboard in this endless game.
While dodging every danger, try to collect all the coins you can see as every coin counts towards your score.

Be careful to not collect those scary skulls! Collecting one of those will make the game harder in some way.
Why not do all this in style?
Buy fancy pets and characters with your hard earned coins!

This is a perfect game for a quick game session while e.g. waiting for your bus/train and have a quick go for a round or two. It is also great for a long session if you want to collect as much coin as possible or reach a great high score!

Power Ups
-Get power ups when you smash crates
-Discover different power ups
-It's always random what power up you get in the crates

Skulls
-Avoid these since it will make the game harder or more fun, depends on how you see it
-It's always random what kind of difficulty you get from the skulls

Obstacles
-Some obstacles are blockers
-Other obstacles mean instadeath

Show the world that you are the best! Download How far you can make it today!
